sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose it it given that
\[
	9 p - 4 q = 6 p + 2 q 
\]
Then find the value of the following expressions.
\[
	\frac{6 p + 3 q }{6 p - 3 q }
\]
\[
	\frac{6 p ^2 + 10 q ^2 }{6 p ^2 - 10 q ^2}
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "It is given that
\[
	9 p - 4 q = 6 p + 2 q 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \input[s1v1]{} p = 6 \input[s1v2]{}
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": " 
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{p }{\input[s2v1]{} } = \frac{\input[s2v2]{} }{3 } = \frac{2 }{1 }
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "$$\text{
Now, multiplying the above equation with $\frac{6 }{3 }$ on both sides, we get}$$
\[
	\frac{\input[s3v1]{} p }{3 q } = \frac{\input[s3v2]{} }{3 }
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Now, by using componendo and dividendo rule, we get
\[
	\frac{6 p + 3 \input[s4v1]{} }{6 p - 3 q } = \frac{12 + 
	3 }{12 - \input[s4v2]{} }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{6 p + 3 q }{6 p - 3 q } = \frac{5 }{3 }
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "$$\text{
Now, lets square the expression of $\frac{p }{q }$}$$
\[
	\frac{p ^2 }{q ^2 } = \frac{\input[s5v1]{}}{1 }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{6 p ^2 }{10 q ^2 } = \frac{24 }{\input[s5v2]{}}
\]"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Now, by using componendo and dividendo, we get
\[
	\frac{6 p ^2 + 10 q ^2 }{6 p ^2 - \input[s6v1]{} q ^2} = \frac{24 + 10 }{\input[s6v2]{} - 10 }
\]"}, {"id": "s7", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{6 p ^2 + 10 q ^2 }{6 p ^2 - 10 q ^2} = \frac{17 }{7 }
\]
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [3, "q"], "text": "$$\text{Upon simplification of $9 p - 4 q = 6 p + 2 q$ we get $3 p = 6 q$}$$"}, {"data": ["q", 6], "text": "$$\text{Dividing both sides by $q$, we get $\frac{p }{q } = \frac{2 }{1 }$}$$"}, {"data": [6, 12], "text": ""}, {"data": ["q", 3], "text": "$$\text{Applying componendo and dividendo rule on the previous equation we get $\frac{6 p + 3 q }{6 p - 3 q } = \frac{5 }{3 }$}$$"}, {"data": [4, 10], "text": "$$\text{Upon squaring $\frac{p }{q }$, and multiplying numerator and denominator by $6$ and $10$ respectively, we get $ \frac{6 p ^2 }{10 q ^2 } = \frac{24 }{10 }$}$$"}, {"data": [10, 24], "text": "$$\text{Applying componendo and dividendo on the previous equation we get $\frac{6 p ^2 + 10 q ^2 }{6 p ^2 - 10 q ^2} = \frac{24 + 10 }{24 - 10 }$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
